participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and artistic, Lily has a love for nature and often finds beauty in the small things around her.
participant_1.background: Growing up in a small town, she developed a deep appreciation for the outdoors and spends her free time painting landscapes.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Ethan enjoys exploring new places and often seeks out scenic views.
participant_2.background: Having traveled extensively for work and pleasure, he carries a wealth of experiences and stories from different cultures.
